node.@animation: RepeatForever[       Animate[       0.5..0.6       ,[folder:maps.animations::,       frames:       bird/bird/bird_0001.png,       bird/bird/bird_0002.png,       bird/bird/bird_0003.png,       bird/bird/bird_0004.png,       bird/bird/bird_0005.png,       bird/bird/bird_0006.png,       bird/bird/bird_0007.png,       bird/bird/bird_0008.png,       bird/bird/bird_0009.png,       bird/bird/bird_0010.png       ]]]

RepeatForever[       Animate[       0.6       ,[folder:maps.animations::,       frames:       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0001.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0002.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0003.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0004.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0005.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0006.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0007.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0008.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0009.png,       bird/shadow/bird_shadow_0010.png       ]]]
